function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reliance on external data sources for WNF case data and temperature anomalies may introduce inaccuracies and inconsistencies.","Impact":"Inaccurate data could lead to misinterpretation of risk factors and incorrect mitigation strategies.","Mitigation":"Verify the reliability and consistency of data sources before using them in the analysis. Use multiple sources for validation where possible.","Technologies":"Data validation and verification tools, statistical data analysis software.","People":"Researchers, analysts, and public health authorities.","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations."},{"Description":"Overreliance on temperature anomalies and environmental variables may overlook other important risk factors for WNV transmission.","Impact":"Failure to consider all relevant risk factors could result in incomplete risk assessments and ineffective mitigation strategies.","Mitigation":"Conduct comprehensive risk assessments that consider a wide range of environmental, ecological, and human-related factors. Use multi-disciplinary teams for analysis and review.","Technologies":"Data integration and analysis tools, multidisciplinary collaboration platforms.","People":"Environmental scientists, epidemiologists, public health experts.","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations."},{"Description":"Inadequate consideration of human and behavioral factors in WNV transmission risk assessment.","Impact":"Failure to account for human behavior and population dynamics could lead to incomplete risk assessments and ineffective mitigation strategies.","Mitigation":"Incorporate demographic, behavioral, and socio-economic data into risk assessments. Collaborate with social scientists and public health experts to integrate human factors into the analysis.","Technologies":"Demographic and socio-economic data analysis tools, collaboration platforms.","People":"Social scientists, public health experts, epidemiologists.","Owner":"Health departments, public health organizations."}]}
